issue.title: Create a way to visualize joint limits

content.raw:
I think displaying the limits as numbers is already covered in the main window (model list widget) and in the model editor (joint inspector).

I agree that showing something in the 3D space for all joints at the same time would clutter the screen. I like the idea of only showing it on hover, and perhaps also for the selected joint.
